trans-unit.source: Abstract class that, when implemented, defines an animation segment with its own target value and interpolation method for a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"></xref> class that has the specified target <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame.Value"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame.Value"></xref> of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"></xref> instance.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"></xref> class that has the specified target <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame.Value"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame.KeyTime"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame.Value"></xref> of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"></xref> instance.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame.KeyTime"></xref> of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"></xref> instance.
Returns the interpolated value of a specific key frame at the progress increment provided.
The base value is typically the initial value of the property being animated or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BooleanKeyFrame.Value%2A> of the previous key frame.
Most implementations will return the value of `baseValue` when `keyFrameProgress` is 0.0.
The value to animate from.
A value between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
Occurs if keyFrameProgress is not between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive.
Calculates the value of a key frame at the progress increment provided.
The value to animate from; typically the value of the previous key frame.
A value between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
Gets or sets the time at which the key frame's target <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame.Value"></xref> should be reached.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The time at which the key frame's current value should be equal to its <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame.Value"></xref> property.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Uniform"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame.KeyTime"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets the key frame's target value.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The key frame's target value, which is the value of this key frame at its specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame.KeyTime"></xref>.
The default value is 0.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame.Value"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets the value associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime"></xref> instance.
The current value for this property.
